learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of OPIC (online Page Importance Computation)
Apply OPIC (online Page Importance Computation) in practical scenarios
Implement solutions using OPIC (online Page Importance Computation)
sections.background: A crawling strategy that assigns the same "gold coins" to each web page. Whenever a page P is downloaded, the "gold coins" owned by P are equally distributed to the linked pages contained in the web page.

metadata.concept_definition: A crawling strategy that assigns the same "gold coins" to each web page. Whenever a page P is downloaded, the "gold coins" owned by P are equally distributed to the linked pages contained in the web page.
metadata.source_topic: External Data Acquisition using Web Crawlers
